message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with the design of erasure codes for distributed storage, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of information theory (cs.IT), distributed computing (cs.DC), distributed systems (cs.DS), and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Additionally, the paper discusses the repair performance of the codes, which is a key aspect of practical implementation, and could potentially fall under the sub-category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
